page.title: 12FARMS IN ABINGTON
page.content: We have studied farm life at 38 South Rd, 32 South Rd & Park Farm. The day begins at 6.30 am at No.38 with cut- ting celery. ll.30 - odd jobs,1.00pm - lunch, 2.00 - planting lettuces & other jobs, 3.30 - office work, 7.00 - dinner, 8-10.30pm irrigation & office work. At Park Farm there are 5 tractors, l JCB, l Caterpillar, l Com- bine, 2 sprayers, 3 muck spreaders, 2 harrows & a sower. A rotavator has been converted into a machine for scr- aping muck from the pigsty. 32 South Rd consists of 5 hectares, l.25 hectares is used for glasshouses, all glass mono cropped with lettuce, 6 crops per year. 1,100,000 heads of butter head type lettuce is sold to supermarkets and grocers per year.
